scripts.dev: npm run composer:install && npm run composer:dump && npm run lint:php:fix
scripts.build: npm run composer:install && npm run composer:dump && npm run lint:php
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync
scripts.zip:theme: npm run build && npm run composer:prod && rm -rf /tmp/project-theme && mkdir -p /tmp/project-theme && rsync -a --exclude='.git' --exclude='.vscode' --exclude='package*.json' --exclude='composer.*' --exclude='.phpcs.xml' --exclude='README.md' --exclude='CHANGELOG.md' --exclude='CLAUDE.md' --exclude='*.zip' --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='scripts' . /tmp/project-theme/ && cd /tmp && zip -r "$OLDPWD/project-theme-$(node -p "require('$OLDPWD/package.json').version").zip" project-theme && rm -rf /tmp/project-theme && cd - && npm run composer:install
